dumb-list
=========

SYNOPSIS
--------

   dumb-list [-k "<keyword1> [...]" ] [collection]

DESCRIPTION
-----------

dumb-list lists the bookmarks in a collection, possibly filtered 
by keyword.

OPTIONS
-------

-h, --help
   Show an help message.
-k <keywords>, --keywords=<keywords> 
   Space separated keyword list.
-v, --verbose
   Be verbose.


SEE ALSO
--------

:doc:`dumb(1) <dumb>`
